property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_acclass.col_schema
property.value: ACCLASSCODE VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL COMMENT 'A unique code that refers to particular Account classification/type These code classifies the account for Balance Sheet purposes This is one of the chart fields in PSGL'^DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'Refers to the descripton of the Account classification code'^COSTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates if the particular Account Classification is a Cost Centre'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted) '^ACCLASSSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'account class status'^ZEROISEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'ZEROISEFLAG'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_acclnk.col_schema
property.value: CURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account / deal'^ACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ACCOUNT NUMBER'^SEQNO VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'If a parent record has multiple child records then it is identified by unique sequence number'^LINKCURRENCY VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the currency of the Account to be linked A account is identified by the combination of Currency and the Account No In New Mode, enter the required currency code or select it from LOV In other modes, this is a display only field'^LINKACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the Account No pertaining to the customer / Internal'^TEMPLATEID VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Template id : A code that refers to a particular Template If this is input, then the system will open the link account in terms of the values defined in the template'^MASTERNO VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'A unique number that identifies the Master number for which account is opened'^RELATIONSHIPNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to primary relationship number of the customer account to whom this Subsidiary Account is linked'^LINKBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'It is a 3 character code which iss used to identify a particular branch Refers to the Branch where the Link account is opened'^LINKPRODUCT VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the Product Code of the Account to be linked It s a 3 digit unique product code Should be Numeric'^LNKACCTTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates the type of the linked account Possible values are Interest in Suspense A/c, Provision A/c, Past due Account and others'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_account.col_schema
property.value: CURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account / deal'^ACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Refers to the Account No pertaining to the customer / Internal'^DRINTPRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the Debit Interest Product code'^PRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the product code of the account / deal (product like Savings account, Current Account,Fixed Deposits,Loans and Interest products)'^CRINTPRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the Credit Interest Product code'^SHORTNAME VARCHAR(110) COMMENT 'It is displayed by the system from the short name of the customer defined at the Relationship module It is editable'^SEGMENTCODE VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Indicates the segment to which the customer/account holder belongs It is defaulted with the segment code value in the Master account'^CRINTCURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account'^CRINTACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the Account No pertaining to the customer / Internal'^BULKEXECUTIONDATE DATE COMMENT 'Bulk Execution Date:Refers to the date on which bulked charges can be debited to the account This field is mandatory only if Bulking Charges is Yes The value in this field is updated by the system depending on the Frequency selected'^OPERATINGINS VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the account operating instructions The option selected while creating the Master is displayed in this field'^DRINTCURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account'^DRINTACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the debit interest account, to which Interest is to be debited'^CRINTINDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether credit interest can be accrued for this account Options are Yes and No'^DRINTINDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate whether debit interest needs to be calculated for the account'^ADVINTINDICATOR VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'advice indicator for the capitalisation of the interest ie post credit or post debot or post both or none, values 1 , 2, 3'^INTSTMTINDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether interest statement is applicable for this account'^INTERESTCODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Refers to the Interest code which will be attached to an account / Deal for the purpose of calculating and apply interest'^ACCLASSCODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'A unique code that refers to particular Account classification/type These code classifies the account for Balance Sheet purposes This is one of the chart fields in PSGL'^BLOCKFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Options are Yes and No If this flag is set to Yes, then only authorised users will be able to view such blocked accounts'^EXCHCONTROLFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This field is specific to Pakistan All those accounts, for which transactions are routed through Nostro, Vostra accounts and which needs to be reported to State Bank of Pakistan have this flag set to Yes'^PRPPAFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether it is a PRPPA account (Periodic Prepayment Purchase Price Account) This field is specific to certain territories mainly Pakistan'^FORWARDCOVERRATE DECIMAL(17,9) COMMENT 'This field is specific to Pakistan Refers to the Forward Cover Rate All foreign currency accounts are surrendered to State Bank of Pakistan at a particular rate, which is referred to as the Forward cover rate'^FROZENSURRENDER VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This field is specific Pakistan Indicates whether the account is Frozen/Surrender The drop down menu values are:'^EXCHANGERATE DECIMAL(17,9) COMMENT 'This field is specific to Pakistan All foreign currency accounts surrendered to State Bank of Pakistan in return for the Local currency at a particular exchange rate It refers to this exchange rate'^MATCHINGFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'To indicate if the account participates in Deal or in Pools,'^MEMOFLAG1 VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Special Remarks can be entered in this field'^MEMOFLAG2 VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Special Remarks can be entered in this field'^MEMOFLAG3 VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Special Remarks can be entered in this field'^NOTES1 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Short descriptive notes at an account level Special remarks can be entered in this field'^MEMOFLAG4 VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Special Remarks can be entered in this field'^NOTES2 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Short descriptive notes at an account level Special remarks can be entered in this field'^NOTES3 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Short descriptive notes at an account level Special remarks can be entered in this field'^MEMOFLAG5 VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Special Remarks can be entered in this field'^USRDEFINEDCODE1 VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'These are user defined fields, defined at System Level'^USRDEFINEDCODE2 VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'These are user defined fields, defined at System Level'^USRDEFINEDCODE3 VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'These are user defined fields, defined at System Level'^USRDEFINEDCODE4 VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'These are user defined fields, defined at System Level'^USRDEFINEDCODE5 VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'These are user defined fields, defined at System Level'^USRDEFINEDCODE6 VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'These are user defined fields, defined at System Level'^USRDEFINEDCODE7 VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'These are user defined fields, defined at System Level'^USRDEFINEDCODE8 VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'These are user defined fields, defined at System Level'^USRDEFINEDCODE9 VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'These are user defined fields, defined at System Level'^USRDEFINEDCODE10 VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'These are user defined fields, defined at System Level'^ACCLOSUREREASON VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the Reason for the closure of account This field is enabled only in Close mode It is also a Mandatory field in Close mode'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^ACCLOSEDT DATE COMMENT 'date on which account is closed'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^ACCOUNTBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'Refers to the Branch where the account is opened'^UCACODE VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'It a unique 5 digit code that refers to a particular universal classification of accounts This field is specific to only'^ISEBSWCUSTOMER VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether statements can be sent to the customer via SWIFT (EBSW Electronic Banking System for Windows )'^ACCTCURRENTSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Account current status Indicates the status of the account Defaults to None in New Mode while creating, and gets updated to open when the New record is authorised In Edit mode, the status can be modified and for this select from the dropdown menu The dropdown values are Active, Dormant, Unclaimed and Reactivate'^EBSWCUSTSWIFT VARCHAR(12) COMMENT 'Swift code of the customer'^TRANSTODORMANTDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which account turned dormant'^TRANSTOUNCLAIMDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which account turned unclaimed'^RENEWROLLOVERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Rollover date in case of loans'^REACTIVEDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date account was re-activated either from dormant or unclaimed'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^LASTDRTRNDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which last debit transaction happened in this account'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^ACOPENDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the date on which the account was opened Defaults with System Date This can be modified, but not to a future date Can be a back value date, but cannot be less than the Opening Date of the Master'^LASTCRTRNDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which last credit transaction happened in this account'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CRLASTACCRUALDATE DATE COMMENT 'Stamps the last Credit interest Accrual Date for the account'^LASTDRTRNEXCLSYSDT DATE COMMENT 'Date on which last debit customer initiated transaction was posted for the account exclusive of system initiated trn'^DRLASTACCRUALDATE DATE COMMENT 'refers to the last debit interest accrual date'^CRLASTINTPAYDATE DATE COMMENT 'Stamps the last Credit interest Pay Date for the account'^REFENTRIESMARKER VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'this field is not being used'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CRINTACCRUEDAMT DECIMAL(27,5) COMMENT 'Credit interest amount accrued for the account after last capitalization'^DRLASTINTPAYDATE DATE COMMENT 'Indicates last debit interest payment date for that account'^DRINTACCRUEDAMT DECIMAL(27,5) COMMENT 'Refers to the debit interest accrued for a particular account'^CRINTADJAMT DECIMAL(27,5) COMMENT 'Credit Interest system Adjusted amount for that accrual period till that date'^REJENTRIESMARKER VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'this field is not being used'^CRNEXTINTPAYDATE DATE COMMENT 'Indicates next credit interest payment date for that account'^DRINTADJAMT DECIMAL(27,5) COMMENT 'Debit Interest Adjusted amount for that accrual period till that date'^INCLUDEINTPOOLFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates that the account is included as part of pool for pooling service'^PROVADJAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Provision adjustment amount for the account'^LASTOFFLINECHGDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which last offline charge transaction was posted for the account'^OLDACCOUNTNUMBER VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Old account number eg BBS / Hogan accountnumber if eBBS is migrated for a country'^TRANPRICINGRATE DECIMAL(17,9) COMMENT 'Indicates the rate of transfer pricing'^SUPRESSSTMTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether Account Statement for this account should be suppressed or not Options are Yes and No If this flag is set, then the Account Statement will get generated in a separate file so that it will not be printed and sent to the customer'^DRNEXTINTPAYDATE DATE COMMENT 'Indicates next debit interest payment date for that account'^LASTCRTRNEXCLSYSDT DATE COMMENT 'Date on which last credit customer initiated transaction was posted for the account exclusive of system initiated trn'^CRMANUALADJAMT DECIMAL(27,5) COMMENT 'Credit Interest manual Adjusted amount for that accrual period till that date'^BULKCHARGESFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Bulk Charges Flag: Indicates whether charges for this account can be bulked Available radio button options are Yes and No'^DRMANUALADJAMT DECIMAL(27,5) COMMENT 'debit Interest manual Adjusted amount for that accrual period till that date'^INTINSUSPENSE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Options are Yes and No If Yes, then interest debited to this account will be credited to Interest In suspense account and if it is No, respective P & L account will be credited'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^BULKINGFREQUENCY VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Contains the Frequency Code :Refers to the frequency at which bulked charges for this account are to be debited from this account This field is mandatory only if Bulking Charges is Yes'^MASTERNO VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'A unique number that identifies the Master number for which account is opened'^INTRADAYLMTMASTNO VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'Refers to the Master No of the Intra Day Limit attached to this account'^SUPPRESSADVFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether Advice for this account should be suppressed or not Options are Yes and No If this flag is set, then the Advice will get generated but will not be sent to the customer'^SUPPRESSOTHFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether other correspondence for this account should be suppressed or not Options are Yes and No'^BULKTRNFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate that transactions for the account for the day should be posted in bulk This is applicable only for internal accounts'^SELFRECONCILEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'It is for internal account only Indicates whether the account is of a Self-reconciling nature, like COC Clearing Account (in US)'^INSTRUMENTTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates the instrument type that will be used by this account Options available in the drop down are:'^IBCTHRESHOLDAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'ibc threshold amount'^LIMITNO VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Refers to the Limit No that master which is attached to account and unique for a master'^LIMITMASTERNO VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'Refers to the Master No of the Limit that is attached to this account'^MULTIPLELIMITS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Available options are Yes and No'^CRLASTACCADJAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Credit Last Accrued Adjument Amount'^DRLASTACCADJAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Debit Last Accrued Adjument Amount'^INTRADAYLMTNO VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Refers to Intra Day Limit No of the same Limit attached to account'^ACCTITLE VARCHAR(110) COMMENT 'Account Title: Indicates the full name of the Corporate customer If this field is left blank in New Mode, then the name given the customers relationship is populated by the system when OK button is clicked after successful validation It is editable'^SUPRESSINTSTMTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether Interest Statement for this account should be suppressed or not Options are Yes and No If this flag is set, then the Interest Statement will get generated but will not be sent to the customer'^PRPPACURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account'^PRPPAACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'PRPPA accountno where in the interest capitalisation is done on this accountno, applicable for PK'^LASTCRINTRATE DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Rate used to calculate last credit interest accrual for the account'^LASTDRINTRATE DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Rate used to calculate last debit interest accrual for the account'^LASTEXSINTRATE DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Rate used to calculate last excess interest for the account'^PCRINTACCRUEDAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'PRPPA credit interest accrued amount , PK specific'^PDRINTACCRUEDAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'PRPPA credit interest adjustment amount , PK specific'^PCRINTADJAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'PRPPA credit interest adjustment amount , PK specific'^PDRINTADJAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'PRPPA credit interest adjustment amount , PK specific'^PCRMANUALADJAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'PRPPA credit interest adjustment amount , PK specific'^PDRMANUALADJAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'PRPPA credit interest adjustment amount , PK specific'^INTFORFEITUREREASN VARCHAR(500) COMMENT 'Interest forefeiture reason'^TAXNOMCURRCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the currency code of Customers Nominated Tax Account No'^TAXNOMACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the Account No of Customers Nominated Tax Account No'^TAXCTGCODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Refers to the Tax category code basing on which the calculated tax is to be debited to the Nominated Tax Account of the customer'^MATURITYDATE DATE COMMENT 'This refers to the Maturity date of the Loan account This is used to calculate GRT (Gross Receipt Tax), which is a tax on the interest earned, by the bank Calculation is based on Maturity date (minus) system date This gives the remaining period appropriate rate will be applied if the remaining period is less than or more than 5 years'^LASTTAXAPPLDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which last tax was applied on the account'^LASTCONDINTAPPLDATE DATE COMMENT 'Last Date on which Conditional interest was Applied on the account'^CRINTFORACCRPERIOD DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'credit interest for the accrued period'^DRINTFORACCRPERIOD DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'debit interest for the accrued period'^INTELIGIBILITYFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'flag indicates wheher theaccount is elligible for interest'^CONSOLSTMT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Consolidate Statement Flag (valid values Yes or NO): It overrides the relationship level Consolidated Statement Flag If it is set to yes at relationship and no at subsidiary account level, then this account will not be part of the consolidated statement'^MIRRORTRNCURR VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Mirror account currency code or main account currency code for which above sub account is ,applicable China Specific'^MIRRORTRNACCNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'This is China specific In China, a customer cannot have more than one account in a single foreign currency In order to handle this, if a customer wants more then one account under a same foreign currency, sub accounts (also called as Mirror Transaction Account) are created under the main foreign currency account'^GLDEPTID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'GL Department ID is one of the chart of accounts used for Peoplesoft GL'^CHARGEPRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Charge product Code'^DSRCLOSINGID VARCHAR(11) COMMENT 'The DSR id is used to capture the details of the employee who has closed in a deal / account'^DSRREFERRALID VARCHAR(11) COMMENT 'This field is used to store the user id of the Direct sales referral person used in SSD Data mart'^DSRSOURCINGID VARCHAR(11) COMMENT 'The DSR id is used to capture the details of the employee who has sourced in a deal / account'^LINENUMBER VARCHAR(11) COMMENT 'Line Number'^AUTOCLOSE interest compound'^ORGMAKBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'originator maker branch'^ACCTCATEGORY VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'account cateogory'^NEXTCRINTCOMPDATE DATE COMMENT 'next credit interest computed date'^NEXTDRINTCOMPDATE DATE COMMENT 'next debit interest computed date'^ORIGMAKTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'originator maker time'^ORIGMAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'originator maker date'^IBAN VARCHAR(34) COMMENT checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^CRPEGBALANCE DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'If peg is set, then while calculating credit interest, peg balance will be deducted from the account balance and for the rest of the balance only interest will be calculated I e on peg balance no interest will be calculated'^DRPEGBALANCE DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'If peg is set, then while calculating debit interest, peg balance will be deducted from the account balance and for the rest of the balance only interest will be calculated I e on peg balance no interest will be calculated'^REPRICINGFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates if Repricing is allowed or not and if allowed, whether it is Automatic or Manual'^NEXTREPRICINGDT DATE COMMENT 'Refers to a date on which the next repricing is due Can be the current system date or a future date This field is Mandatory if Repricing flag is Auto or Manual'^LASTREPRICINGDT DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the date on which repricing was last done for this account'^REPRICINGFREQ VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Refers to the Frequency at which repricing is to be done This field is Mandatory if Repricing flag is Auto or Manual'^CRREPRINTRT DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the Repricing Rate for Credit interest This field is Mandatory if Repricing flag is Auto or Manual'^DRREPRINTRT DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the Repricing Rate for Debit interest This field is Mandatory if Repricing flag is Auto or Manual'^EXREPRINTRT DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the Repricing Rate for Excess interest This field is Mandatory if Repricing flag is Auto or Manual'^CRMARGINFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the margin for the Excess Band defined below is Offset or Percentile'^DRMARGINFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the margin for the Excess Band defined below is Offset or Percentile'^EXMARGINFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the margin for the Excess Band defined below is Offset or Percentile'^COLUMNDRMARGINFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'column margin flag'^COLUMNEXMARGINFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'column margin flag'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_acstmt.col_schema
property.value: CURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account / deal'^ACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Refers to the Account No pertaining to the customer / Internal'^SEQNO DECIMAL(3,0) NOT NULL COMMENT 'If a parent record has multiple child records then it is identified by unique sequence number'^FREQUENCY VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Refers to the code that denotes frequency, such as daily, monthly,fortnightly etc'^STMTTYPECODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Refers to a unique code that defines a particular statement type'^LASTSTMTDATE DATE COMMENT 'Last Statemented Date'^NEXTSTMTDATE DATE COMMENT 'Next Statement Date'^NOOFSTMTS DECIMAL(7,0) COMMENT 'No Of Statements generated'^NOOFDUPSTMTS DECIMAL(7,0) COMMENT 'No Of Duplicate Statements Generated Depricated from e10 onwards'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^DBSTMTCHRGACNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'It gives the Account number, that has to be charged on statement generation'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^FROMTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'Refers to the time from which the customer wants the statement to be generated Thus its the lower bound of Intra day statement time period'^TOTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'Refers to the time till which the statement needs to be generated Thus its the upper'^INTRASTMTTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Customer can choose for incremental or cumulative intra day statement Incremental'^INTERVALTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'F - Fixed, S - Specific - Used for Intraday Statements'^FIXEDINTERVAL DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'Intra day frequency value can be at a fixed interval (e g : for every 30 minutes) This field becomes mandatory and the value needs to be entered when the FIXED INTERVAL radio button is checked'^SPECIFICINTERVALS VARCHAR(2000) COMMENT 'Intra day frequency value can be at specified times (e g : 10o clock, 1o clock, 4o clock etc) The system supports maximum of 15 specific intervals This field becomes mandatory and the value needs to be entered when the SPECIFIC INTERVAL radio button is checked'^SUMMARYTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Refers to whether summary is required on a statement total or page total basis'^NOOFPAGES DECIMAL(7,0) COMMENT 'No Of Pages Generated so far'^NEXTSTMTTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'Refers to the date on which the next statement is to be generated'^TRANTYPE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the type of transaction for which statements are to be generated The dropdown values are credit only, debit only or both debit and credit'^LASTSTMTTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'Last Statement Time - Used for Intraday Statements'^EODTOPROCESS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag which specifies whether EOD service need to pickup for anay missed interval or not - Used for Intraday Statements'^POSTENGINESTAMP DECIMAL(23,0) COMMENT 'Transaction Number - Used for Intraday Statements'^LASTPOSTENGINESTAMP DECIMAL(23,0) COMMENT 'Last Statemented Transaction Number - Used for Intraday Statements'^MOVEMENTFREQ VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'When flag set to yes, generates a swift statement as and when a transaction'^LASTEXECSEQNO DECIMAL(15,0) COMMENT 'last execution sequence number'^OPENINGBALANCE DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'opening balance'^CONSOLIDATE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'consolidate'

Marks the record to be deleted Force Post and Mark Closed Marks the record to be closed'^POSTAFTERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the date after which the block is actually executed'^PARTIALRELFLAG customer / Internal'^CHQSTARTNO VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL COMMENT 'This field denotes the 1st cheque leaf number (start number) of the cheque book that is issued'^ISSUEDATE DATE COMMENT 'Cheque issue date'^REQID VARCHAR(13) COMMENT 'This field contains a unique Request ID generated by the system for every cheque book request'^NOOFLEAVES DECIMAL(5,0) COMMENT 'Number of leaves in the cheque'^BOOKSTATUS DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'Indicates the status of a cheque book whether the same has been issued, avtivated etc'^CHARGECODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'It a four character code which identifies a particular charge code For example CHG1'^BOOKACTIVATEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Cheque book activate flag'^CHGDRACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the Account No pertaining to the customer from which the charge amount need to be debited'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^BOOKACTIVATEDT DATE COMMENT 'It captures the date on which cheque Book got activated'^BOOKDEACTIVATEDT DATE COMMENT 'It captures the date on which the stop has been placed on a complete cheque book'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^DEACTIVATEDREASON VARCHAR(80) COMMENT 'It captures the reason on why the cheque book has been deactivated'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^SYSCHARGEAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'It displays the charge amount captured at the charge setup level'^AMDCHARGEAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'It captures the charge amount if the user manually amend the charge default from the chareg setup level'^USEDCHQLEAVES DECIMAL(5,0) COMMENT 'It captures the details of cheque book which has been requested but not activated'^NOOFTIMESPRINTED DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'Number of times printed'^PRINTEDDATE DATE COMMENT 'Cheque book Printed date'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_chrgcpr.col_schema
property.value: CURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account / deal'^CHARGECODE VARCHAR(4) NOT NULL COMMENT 'It a four character code which identifies a particular charge code For example CHG1'^PRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Refers to the product code of the account / deal (product like Savings account, Current Account,Fixed Deposits,Loans and Interest products)'^DEPOSITORLOAN VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Is product deposit or loan'^CHRGSEQNO DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'Charge sequence number'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_chrgdet.col_schema
property.value: CURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account / deal'^CHARGECODE VARCHAR(4) NOT NULL COMMENT 'It a four character code which identifies a particular charge code For example CHG1'^NARRATION1 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATION2 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATION3 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATION4 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATION5 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATION6 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^DRTRNCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'transaction code which is used to post debit entries'^CRTRNCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'transaction code which is used to post credit entries'^ONLINECHRGFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'It denotes whether the charge is Online Or Offline charge'^CONTRACODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Contra code may be defined as the mechanism that helps in identifying the internal account that needs to be impacted in cases where P&L is involved For example 100011 for cash in hand'^PARTIALCHARGEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the customer can be charged partially, if sufficient balance is not available to cover the charge amount The values available are Y, N, I'^EXECFREQUENCY VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'It refers to the Execution frequency of offline charge'^CHRGONBALORCTR VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Criteria for charge calculation :: B - Balance Amount, C - Counter like transaction count / chq return count etc'^INCLPRODACROSS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'All Accounts under Master / Relation to consider for charge calculation :: R - Relation, M - Master, A - None'^PRODACROSSCURRFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether other Currency account balances of the customer can be considered for calculating charges If Include Products Across is set to None, then this field gets disabled'^DPPRDEXISTORADDBAL VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This option describes whether the existence of the Product specified in the Product code field or their balances must be considered in order to waive the charge on an account'^LNPRDEXISTORADDBAL VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This option describes whether the existence of the Product specified in the Product code field or their balances must be considered in order to waive the charge on an account'^COMPAREOPERATOR VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'The Comparison operator is used for comparing the Transaction amount/Account balance /Counter Value to the value specified in the Band amount field The values are L, <, > etc'^CHRGONBALORSFALL VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Charge to be applied for balance amount or shortfall amount This flag will be works only for balanced based charge'^CHARGEMETHOD VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the charge is calculated in Progressive or Regressive manner'^ROUNDOFFFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This identifies if charges can be rounded off to the nearest whole number or not as per the option chosen'^MULTIPLESFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the Multiples of Counter is allowed or not This field gets enabled only if Calculate Charges On is set to Counter'^SEARCHVALUE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'The search values are Statistical fields Based on the statistical constant selected, corresponding charge criteria (band value and the charge applicable to it) will be applied'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^CONDITION VARCHAR(100) COMMENT 'Condition for executing the charge For e g No of transactions > 20, min balance <200 Based on the condition defined, corresponding charge criteria will be applied'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^REVERSALFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag indicates if charges can be reveresed'^NETOFFFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the regulatory charges can be subtracted from the interest directly during capitalization If selected No, all the charges under this set up post a separate entry along with interest'^SINGLEORMULTIFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Single Or Mulitple Flag'^EXPIRYDAYS DECIMAL(5,0) COMMENT ''

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_chrgtrn.col_schema
property.value: TRNCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'transaction code refers the cr / dr entry posted for a trn The transaction codes are mapped to the transction type, certain transaction codes are used by the system to post tax, interest,charges and batches'^SEQNO VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL COMMENT 'If a parent record has multiple child records then it is identified by unique sequence number'^CHARGECODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'It a four character code which identifies a particular charge code For example CHG1'^CHANNELID VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'It refers to a unique 4-digit code which identifies the channel through which a transaction occurs For example 0002 for'^PRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the product code of the account / deal (product like Savings account, Current Account,Fixed Deposits,Loans and Interest products)'^NARRATION VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^SEGMENTCODE VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Segment Code to be associated with specified charge'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^REASONCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Reason Code'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_cpnext.col_schema
property.value: TRNCHID VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Transche ID'^DEALNO VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Refers to the unique no: to identify the deposit or Loan'^SCHNO DECIMAL(5,0) NOT NULL COMMENT 'subscriper number'^STRNCHID VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'subcriper transche id'^CPNPAYMTDT DATE COMMENT 'Coupon payment date'^INTACCTNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'interest account to which the deposit interest to be credit'^TOTCPNPAYMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'total coupon payement'^CPNRATETYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Coupon rate type'^CPNRATE DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'coupon rate'^CPNSTARTDT DATE COMMENT 'coupon start date'^CPNENDDATE DATE COMMENT 'coupon end date'^CPNAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'coupon amount'^CPNPYMNTSTS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Coupon payment STS'^APPNO VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Application number'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_cpnmnt.col_schema
property.value: TRNCHID VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Can be manual input or system generated according to country specific needs'^SCHNO DECIMAL(5,0) NOT NULL COMMENT 'The schedule is auto generated by the system'^CPNPAYMTDT DATE COMMENT 'The date on which the coupon payment is done This is input by the user for absolute and none coupon payment options For annual option, this is derived by the system based on the start date, end date and frequency of coupon payment This field can later be edited for individual schedules provided the date is between start date and end date of the particular schedule'^TOTCPNPAYMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'This is enabled and mandated if the coupon payment option is chosen as None For the other options, this field is updated based on the sum of all individual coupon payments'^CPNRATETYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Options available are Annual, Absolute and None'^CPNRATE DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'This is a mandatory input for Annual and absolute options For None option this field is not required to be input'^CPNSTARTDT DATE COMMENT 'The coupon payment start date Only for information purposes for the Absolute and None options For annual option, this field is used for generation of the coupon payment schedule'^CPNENDDATE DATE COMMENT 'The coupon payment end date Only for information purposes for the Absolute and None options For annual option, this field is used for generation of the coupon payment schedule'^CPNSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This field is checked if the coupon payment status is Paid for a schedule The updation is carried out automatically by the system'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_crgrd.col_schema
property.value: CRGCODE CHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Refers to the code corresponding to the Credit Risk Grade These Credit risk Grade can be used to denote the risk level of a particular Customer'^SUBSTDCODE VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL COMMENT 'It indicate the customer risk level It a numeric field and it accept character from 0 to 9 If the substandard code 0 then it indicates that there is no risk is attached if it is 9 then it indicates a high risk'^DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'Refers to the description of the Credit Risk Grade code'^INTSUSTEMPLATEID VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'It refers to the account master template id It is mandatory if the intrest in suspense is set to provision The intrest in suspense account is created or opened based on this template'^PROVTEMPLATEID VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'It refers to the account master template id Provisional account will be created or opened based on this It is mandatory if the intrest in suspense is set to provision Provisional account will opened or created based on it'^INTINSUSPENSE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether Interest for those customer accounts with the particular Credit Risk Grade should be posted to Suspense Account or Provision Account The available options are Yes, No and Provision'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^LMTFUNCTION VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates what is to be done in case of credit risk The available options are'^FEESUSTEMPLATEID VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'fees us template id'^PROVFEETEMPLATEID VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'provision fee template id'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_curr.col_schema
property.value: CURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Code to define the currency eg INR<USD'^GRPCURRNUM VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Indicates the Group Numeric Code provided by London SCB'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^LINKCURRENCY VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the SWIFT currency code that the particular currency is linked to For example, in the case of the currency Deutsche Mark, the Link currency is Euro'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^TRLOANTHRAMT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the threshold Loan amount above which the Loans should be placed with the Treasury The Deals module uses this field'^NAME VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'Refers to the Link currency name The value of this field is displayed by the system based on Currency entered'^DRINTCHRGBASIS DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Number of Days based on which debit interest will be calculated The values available are 360 or 365 or 366'^DECIMALPRECISION DECIMAL(1,0) COMMENT 'Indicates the number of decimal places allowed for the defined currency E g USD 2 decimal places, YEN 0 decimal places, OMR - 3 decimal places Values available under the Drop Down are = 0, 2 and 3'^CRINTCHRGBASIS DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the number of Days based on which Credit interest will be calculated The values available are 360 or 365 or 366'^COSTBUYRATEMARGIN DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'cost buy rate margin'^MULTIPLYDIVIDEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the link currency rate is to be multiplied or divided with the specified currency rate If value is entered in Currency field, then this field becomes mandatory The options available are'^TRDEPOSITTHRAMT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the threshold Deposit Amount above which the Deposits should be placed with the Treasury The Deals module uses this field'^RATEDEVIATION DECIMAL(6,3) COMMENT 'Indicates the percentage up to which the currency rates can be changed / deviated'^COSTSELLRATEMARGIN DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the Cost Buy Rate Margin advised by the Treasury for the particular currency'^CTRBUYRATEMARGIN DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the Customer (Counter) Buy Rate margin for the particular currency'^CTRSELLRATEMARGIN DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the Customer (Counter) Sell Rate margin for the particular currency'^DUALAPPROVEAMTLMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Indicates the limit amount above which the transactions involving the particular currency should go for Dual Approval (mainly Teller and Back Office transactions)'^MRKTINTERESTRATE DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the Market Interest Rate for the particular currency advised by the Treasury'^LIBORRATE DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the Market Interest Rate for the particular currency advised by the Treasury This field is currently not in use'^DIBORRATE DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the LIBOR rate for the particular currency This field is currently not being used'^REVALDIVIDER DECIMAL(13,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the DIBOR rate for the particular currency This field is currently not being used'^LINKCURRENCYRATE DECIMAL(17,9) COMMENT 'This field is currently not in use This can be left blank'^WEEKENDDAY1 DECIMAL(1,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the holiday weekend day(first) for the specified currency e g For U S Dollars the first week end day is Saturday, for AED the weekend day is Friday The valid values are: 1- Sunday, 2- Monday, 3- Tuesday, 4- Wednesday,5- Thursday, 6- Friday, 7'^WEEKENDDAY2 DECIMAL(1,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the holiday weekend day (second) for the specified currency e g For U S Dollars the second week end day is Sunday The valid values are: 1- Sunday, 2- Monday, 3- Tuesday, 4- Wednesday,5- Thursday, 6- Friday, 7- saturday'^MIDRATE DECIMAL(17,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the Currency Mid Rate value'^ISOCURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'It an equivalent currency code given by the ISO for a particular currency'^LINKMULTIDIVFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate the action to be taken by the system against LCY to convert to FCY :: M - Multiply, D - Divide (rule to arrive at FCY from LCY)'^AGGMISMATCHFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate whether this Currency can appear in Aggregate Mismatch Report This is for MIS purpose The valid values are Yes and No'^LOANINTTOLERANCE DECIMAL(6,3) COMMENT 'Refers to the tolerance level allowed for the Loan Interest Rates defined If the system calculation varies from the manually entered amount, by more than the tolerance level, the entry will be rejected by the system'^DEPOINTTOLERANCE DECIMAL(6,3) COMMENT 'Refers to the tolerance level for the Deposit Interest rates defined If the system calculation varies from the manually entered amount, by more than the tolerance level, the entry will be rejected by the system'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^COSTBUYRATE DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Refers to the Cost Buy Rate Margin advised by the Treasury for the particular currency'^CURRMINDENO DECIMAL(6,5) COMMENT '#N/A'^INTERESTPRECISION DECIMAL(1,0) COMMENT 'interest precision'^EXCPENMARGIN DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Excess Penalty margin'

Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_infotype.col_schema
property.value: INFORMATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'If the users want to capture extra information at the time of opening relationship, master, subsidiary, deals can be maintained here and the formats, range of values are maintained here'^PROGRAMID VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Indicates the identification code of the program'^DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'Refers to the description corresponding to the Information detail code'^VALIDATE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'To have multiple entries, Validate should be set to Yes If Validate is set to Yes, the Information Detail Code becomes mandatory'^LENGTH DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'Refers to maximum length of the code'^FORMAT VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the format of the code'^MINRANGE DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the minimum range E g, if 1 is entered in the field then, It accepts minimum one value'^MAXRANGE DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the maximum range E g, if 3 is entered in the field then, It accepts maximum of 3 values'^PACKAGE VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Refers to the name of the module where the Corresponding code should appear'^HELPERNAME VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Optional field'^COMPONENTTYPE DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the type of the component in the field The available values are Numeric - Accepts only numerals Alphanumeric - Accepts only alphabets Date - Accepts only date Time - Accepts only numbers as time'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^DEFAULT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'If the radio button is set to Yes, the value is displayed by default'^AUTOPOPULATE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'auto populate'^MULTIPLEVALUE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'multiple value'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_insdet.col_schema
property.value: INSTRUCTIONNO VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL COMMENT 'This is a system-generated number The structure of the number is Current Date (YYYYMMDD) + a four-digit sequence number that is incremented by 1 for each new Instruction for the day'^SEQNO VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL COMMENT 'If a parent record has multiple child records then it is identified by unique sequence number'^CURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account / deal'^ACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the Account No pertaining to the customer / Internal'^TRNCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'transaction code refers the cr / dr entry posted for a trn The transaction codes are mapped to the transction type, certain transaction codes are used by the system to post tax, interest,charges and batches'^DEBITCREDIT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Identifies if the account should be debited or credited'^NARRATIVE1 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATIVE2 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATIVE3 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^AMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Standing order execution amount'^FIRSTAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Transaction amount to be used when the instruction is executed for the first time This field is enabled and mandatory when the Primary and Detail Account currencies are different'^FINALAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Final amount'^PRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the product code of the account / deal (product like Savings account, Current Account,Fixed Deposits,Loans and Interest products)'^FORCEPOSTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'force post flag to set Y for freeing from risk account to executing the Trnasction'^APPINSUFFUNDSFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Application Insufficient Funds Flag'^EXTREFNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'external reference number'^LASTFAILUREDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the instruction Last Failure Date'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^LASTFAILUREREASON VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Populated with the last failure reason'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^MASTERNO VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'A unique number that identifies the Master number for which account is opened'^VIRTUALACCOUNTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'virtual account flag'^BENENAME VARCHAR(80) COMMENT 'beneficiary name'^BENEACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(25) COMMENT 'beneficiary account number'^BENEBANKCODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'beneficiary bank code'^BENEEFTCODE VARCHAR(11) COMMENT 'beneficiary effective code'^BENEADD1 VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'beneficiary address'^BENEADD2 VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'beneficiary address'^BENEADD3 VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'beneficiary address'^BENEADD4 VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'beneficiary address'^BENENARR1 VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'beneficiary narration'^BENENARR2 VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'beneficiary narration'^BENENARR3 VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'beneficiary narration'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_insmast.col_schema
property.value: INSTRUCTIONNO VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL COMMENT 'This is a system-generated number The structure of the number is Current Date (YYYYMMDD) + a four-digit sequence number that is incremented by 1 for each new Instruction for the day'^CURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account / deal'^SEQNO VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'If a parent record has multiple child records then it is identified by unique sequence number'^REMARKS VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Field for capturing the remarks/additional information'^TRNCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Used to post the fund transfer transaction for the instruction Indicates whether the Primary Account is to be debited or credited'^DEBITCREDIT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Populated based on the Transaction Code selected the flag will be defaulted'^NARRATIVE1 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATIVE2 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATIVE3 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^FIRSTAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Transaction amount to be used when the instruction is executed for the first time This field is enabled and mandatory when the Primary and Detail Account currencies are different'^INSDETCURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account'^TOTDETAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'instruction is executed This field is enabled and mandatory when the Primary and Detail Account currencies are the same'^AMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Standing order execution amount'^FINALAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Transaction amount to be used the last time the instruction is executed This field is enabled when the Primary and Detail Account currencies are the same It becomes mandatory if an end date is given for the instruction'^TOTDETFINALAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'instruction is executed This field is enabled and mandatory when the Primary and Detail Account currencies are the same'^TOTDETFIRSTAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Transaction amount to be used the last time the instruction is executed This field is enabled when the Primary and Detail Account currencies are the same It becomes mandatory if an end date is given for the instruction'^PRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the Product code of the specified Detail Account It is mainly for P&L account, to identify the product for profitability purposes'^FORCEPOSTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'To override a refer/reject entry marker on an account'^APPINSUFFUNDSFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Select Yes to specify whether the instruction should be executed even if the funds are insufficient in the debit A/C'^PASTDUEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether a Past Due Account exists for the Primary Account Retry days will automatically default to 0 and first day action will default to Avl SI Amt + Block'^PARTIALEXECFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'If Yes, it indicates that the instruction can be executed with whatever fund is available Applicable when sufficient funds are not available to carry out the instruction We are not using this field extensively since partial blocking of amount pending has been introduced'^STARTDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date from which the instruction should be executed It should not be less than current date'^ENDDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to date on which the last instruction will be executed'^AUTHORITYDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which customer issued the instruction It should be equal or less than current date'^SETUPCHARGEAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'If specified, overrides the charge amount corresponding to the Set up Charge Code selected The amount entered cannot be greater than that specified in the Charge Code'^CHARGECOLLFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'While authorising the instruction,the charge amount is blocked, eventhough it is online charge The block gets released during EOD, and the button is updated to show Yes, confirming the collection of charges'^FREQUENCY VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Refers to the frequency of execution of the instruction'^ONLINETRIGGERFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the Instruction is Online or Offline This option can be used to trigger the Instruction several days prior to its actual execution date It is based on the specified Transaction code If the field is set to Yes, then if the specified transaction occurs, the instruction is activated and the system checks for the availability of funds in the debit account(s) If the instruction amount is available, it will block the funds for that amount If set to Yes, instruction cannot involve multi-currency By default the account will be debited at EOD'^INTERNALFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'internal flag if Y will not be used for customer'^NEXTEXECDATE DATE COMMENT 'Based on the frequency of execution of the instruction system displays the next execution date It is defaulted to the Start Date in New mode and is not editable Every time the instruction is executed successfully, it is updated based on the frequency specified'^BLOCKEDAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Populated with the total blocked amount for that instruction'^LASTSUCESSEXECDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the last successful execution date of the instruction It is a system-updated field'^RETRYDAYS DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'Indicates the number of days the system should retry executing the instruction if it fails on the due date Retry Options set for First, Successive and Final Days are used appropriately Defaulted to zero'^LASTFAILUREDATE DATE COMMENT 'Populates the last failure date'^LASTFAILUREREASON VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Populated with the last failure reason'^DAYSRETRIED DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'Indicates how many days the instruction has been retried'^APPROVERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for verification ( Represents Authorizer branch ID or Authorizer branch number)'^APPROVERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer post the transaction'^APPROVERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'The authroziers user ID'^ACTUALNEXTEXECDATE DATE COMMENT 'Next execution date in case deferment flag is set'^DEALNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the unique no: to identify the deposit or Loan'^APPROVERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'The authorizer Internet Protocol address'^CREATESWEEPFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Check this flag if the customer wishes to use the sweep facility in case of insufficient funds during the instruction execution'^LASTRETRIEDDATE DATE COMMENT 'Indicates the date on which the last retry was done'^FAILURECHARGECODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Indicates the charge if the instruction fails It has to be an Online Charge'^SWEEPNO VARCHAR(12) COMMENT 'It identifies the sweep created between the Primary and Past Due Accounts It is generated when the instruction is authorised'^EXECUTIONSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Last execution status Can be S, R or F'^APPROVERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier post this transaction'^FAILURECHARGEAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'If specified, overrides the charge amount corresponding to the Failure Charge Code selected'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^MASTERNO VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'A unique number that identifies the Master number for which account is opened'^PASTDUEACNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Enabled and mandatory if Past Due Flag is Yes Whenever there is a shortage of funds during instruction execution, system will overdraw the Past Due Account (in master account currency) for the unavailable amount'^SETUPCHARGECODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Charge for setting up the instruction It has to be an Online Charge'^ACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the Account No pertaining to the customer / Internal'^EXECDAYACTION VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'For different retry days, SI retry amount can be set up by Different Block parameters, like'^EXECDAYSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Not used'^FIRSTDAYACTION VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'For different retry days, SI retry amount can be set up by Different Block parameters, like'^SUCCDAYACTION VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'For different retry days, SI retry amount can be set up by Different Block parameters, like'^LASTDAYACTION VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'For different retry days, SI retry amount can be set up by Different Block parameters, like'^STMTBALANCE DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used for eCAPS SI'^MINAMTDUE DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Shows the MIN amount for next execution This value can be changed so that the next executable minimum amount is taken from this field'^AMTEXEC DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used for eCAPS SI'^SUSSTARTDATE DATE COMMENT 'Enabled and mandatory if Suspend SI is Temporary Indicates the date from which the instruction is to be suspended'^SUSPENDSI VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Only for CRD transaction type:'^SUSENDDATE DATE COMMENT 'Indicates the date on which the suspension ends'^FINSIFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the instruction is executed at the same Bank or at a different Bank To execute at a different bank, set to No This flag can be changed only in case of a CRD transaction'^TEMPSIFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Temporary SI Flag'^NETAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Transaction amount to be used the last time the instruction is executed This field is enabled when the Primary and Detail Account currencies are the same It becomes mandatory if an end date is given for the instruction'^AMOUNTKNOWNFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Amount Known Flag'^TRANSTYPE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Two types of transactions can be performed: BBS and CRD CRD is for cards These transaction types are defined in transaction type setup and hard corded'^TFROMDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the Instruction from date'^TTODATE DATE COMMENT 'Date till which the instruction should be executed It should be greater than Start Date and Current Date If the End date is not specified, then the instruction will be executed indefinitely'^CARDSTATUS VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Status of the Card'^FIRSTDAYSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Not used'^SECONDDAYSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Not used'^THIRDDAYSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Not used'^BLOCKPARAM VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'This field is not used presently'^DURATION VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'duration'^FAILURECOUNT DECIMAL(5,0) COMMENT 'failure count'^TOTALFAILURECOUNT DECIMAL(5,0) COMMENT 'Number of times SI has failed till date'^LASTRESTRUCTUREDATE DATE COMMENT 'Last Restructured Date'^RESTRUCTURECOUNTER DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'restructure counter'^RESTRUCTUREFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'restructure flag'^EXTUNIQUEID VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'external unique id'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_intbnd.col_schema

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_lmtlndt.col_schema
property.value: MASTERNO VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL COMMENT 'A unique number that identifies the Master number for which account is opened'^LIMITNO VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Refers to the Limit No that master which is attached to account and unique for a master'^LIMITORLIEN VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag that indicates if it is a Limit or a Lien Valid values are L for Limit and N for Lien'^LIMITCATEGORY VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Category of the product to inidicate if it is OL (Outer Limit), IL (Inner Limit) or OD (Ordinary Limit)'^APPROVEDLIMIT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Limit amount that has been approved Approved Limit can be equal to Active Limit or Greater than Active Limit'^EXPIRYDATE DATE COMMENT 'The Expiry Date of the Limit'^DROPPEDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate if the Limit is dropped or not Valid values - Y / N'^EARMARKEDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate if the Limit is earmarked or not Valid values - Y / N'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^TENOR DECIMAL(5,0) COMMENT 'Limit Tenor in days'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MINIMUMMARGIN DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Minimum Margin of the Interest Rate'^BLOCKED VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to check whether blocked by other processes like Drop Limits, Earmarking etc Default value is N, if blocked by Drop Limits - D, Locked - L'^EODPROCESSDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date field used internally for EOD retry option for the Limits Excess Service'^VALUEDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the date on which the transaction will / should be realized'^COLLATERALCODE VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'Collataral code against which the limit facility is provided'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^BOOKINGLOC VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Location where the Limit is booked'^UNADVISEDLIMIT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'MIS column Can store any MIS related information'^RELATIONALLMIT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Limit amount due to related limits'^NOTES VARCHAR(150) COMMENT 'Generic notes field in which the user can capture any misc information about the Limit'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^CONTOUTSTANDING DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Contingent Outstanding Balance of the Limit'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^EARMARKEDAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Time when the Maker created / amended the facility'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^REVOLVINGFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate if the Limit is a Revolving Limit or not Valid values - Y / N'^COMMITTEDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate if the Limit is a Committed Facility or not Valid values - Y/N'^SECUREDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate whether the Limit facility is secured or not Valid Values Y/N'^TRADEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate whether the limit is trade facility or not Valid Values Y/N'^ACTIVEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Limit Status Flag Defaulted to N When set Y, limit becomes active Valid values - Y/N'^FROZENSUSPENDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate limit dropped due to reviewdate/ extended review date/lliexpirydate /limit expiry date Valid Values N/R/E/L/X'^TERMFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate whether the limit term is short, medium or long This depends on the tenor to define as short, medium or long Valid Values - S/M/L'^SYSGENERATEDDROP VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate whether the Limit was dropped manually or by the system in EOD, if the Limit is dropped Valid values - Y/N'^APPROVDLMTBFDROP DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'The value of the Approved Limit before the Limit was dropped, if the Limit is dropped'^ACTIVELMTBFDROP DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'The value of the Active Limit before the Limit was dropped, if the Limit is dropped'^UNADVLMTBFDROP DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'The value of the Unadvised Limit before the Limit was dropped, if the Limit is dropped'^TOTALLMTBFDROP DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'The value of the Total Available Limit before the Limit was dropped, if the Limit is dropped'^TEMPLMTBFDROP DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'The value of the Temporary Limit before the Limit was dropped, if the Limit is dropped'^TEMPEXPDATEBFDROP DATE COMMENT 'The Expiry Date of the Temporary Limit before the Limit was dropped, if the Limit is dropped'^TOPLEVELMASTER VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'The Master No of the top level node of the Limit'^TOPLEVELLMTNO VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'The Limit No of the top level node of the Limit'^LEVELNO DECIMAL(4,0) COMMENT 'The Level No of the Limit to indicate in which node level it resides in the tree'^UPFRNTCHGAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Amount manually entered to override the charge amount specified by the Charge Code'^DROPPEDDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the Limit was dropped'^LIMITDRPTO DECIMAL(1,0) COMMENT 'The amount to which the Limit was dropped to'^TOTALLIMIT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'The Total Available Limit that includes the Active Limit, Temporary Limit and the Earmarked Amount'^TMPLMTEXPIRYDATE DATE COMMENT 'The Expiry Date of the Temporary Limit'^TEMPLIMIT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'The value of the Temporary Limit'^SUSPENDEDLIMIT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'The value of Suspended Limit Currently this is not used It will be blank'^INTRADAYLIMIT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Limit Amount allotted for a single day is specified here'^RESERVEDLIMIT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Amount that is reserved if any transaction/deals booking with limits is sent for second level approver'^ONBLNOUTSTANDING DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'The value fo the On-balance Outstanding of the Limit'^SCILMTNO VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'The reference of this Limit in the SCI system'^UPFRNTCHGCODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'It a four character code which identifies a particular charge code For example CHG1'^OUTERLIMITNO VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'The Outer Limit No of this Limit, if it is an IL'^LIMITPRDCODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'A unique code that refers to a particular limit product'^DEALNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the unique no: to identify the deposit or Loan'^ACTIVELIMITLIENAMT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Active Limit or Active Lien amount'^CURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account / deal'^PURPOSE VARCHAR(250) COMMENT 'The purpose for which the Limit is maintained'^CONTINGENTBALACC VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'The Account No of the Contingent Balance for the Limit'^DRWNBALFEEACC VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'The Account No of the Drawn Balance Fee'^DRWNBALFEEACUR VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'The Currency Code of the Drawn Balance Fee Account'^UDRWNBALFEEACC VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'The Account No of the Updrawn Balance Fee'^UDRWNBALFEEACUR VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'The Currency Code of the Updrawn Balance Fee Account'^UPFRNTCHGACC VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'The Account No of the Upfront Charge'^UPFRNTCHGACUR VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'The Currency Code of the Upfront Charge Account'^OUTERMASTERNO VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'The Outer Master No of the Limit, if it is an IL'^EARMARKDUEDATE DATE COMMENT 'The Due Date of Earmarking of the Limit'^EXCESSAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'The value of the Excess Amount of the Limit'^SUSPENDEXCESSAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'The value of the Suspended Excess Amount of the Limit'^SHORTTOMEDIUMOS DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^SHORTTOMEDIUMCONT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^SHORTTOLONGOS DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^SHORTTOLONGCONT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^MSTNODUETODROP VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'Master No due to which the limit is dropped Used by Drop Limits screen to fetch the Dropped limits for restoration'^LIMITNODUETODROP VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Limit No due to which the limit is dropped Currently not being used'^TOSHORTONBAL DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Non-Contingent Outstanding of short term limits'^TOSHORTCONT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^TOMEDIUMONBAL DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^TOMEDIUMCONT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^TOLONGONBAL DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^TOLONGCONT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^POSTCONTACTIVEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to set whether the entries to be posted to Contingent Account or Not Values Y/N'^SHORTTOSHORTOS DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^SHORTTOSHORTCONT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Used when Country Limits are utilised'^EXCESSSTARTDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date from which the Limit has been in Excess'^EXCESSPAYDOWN DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'if the cumulative account balances of the accounts that utilise the limit is a credit balance, then shows the credit balance else zero'^ADDTOCREDITLIMITFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag set to define whether the limit facility is a Group Limit or Not Valid Values - Y/N'^LMTSTARTDATE DATE COMMENT 'This field indicates the date on which the limit is effective'^ISLMTUPDATE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Is limit updated'^SHAREDLIMITFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Shared Limit Flag'^SHAREDLIMIT DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Shared limit'^SHRLMTOUTSTANDING DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Share Limit outStanding'^UTILISATIONCAP VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'utilisation cap'^UTILISATIONCAPAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'utilisation cap amount'^LASTEXCESSUPDATED DATE COMMENT 'last excess updated'^LASTEXCESSUPDATEDDATE DATE COMMENT 'Is limit updated'^UTILIZEDAMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'utilized amount'^REFERENCENO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'reference number'^OLDEXCSHRTSTARTDT DATE COMMENT ''^EXCESSCLRDATE DATE COMMENT ''
