property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_mast.col_schema
property.value: MASTERNO VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL COMMENT 'A unique number that identifies the Master number for which account is opened'^ULTIMATECNTRYCODE VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Refers to the country of origin/incorporation of the customer'^BRANCHCODE VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'code which iss used to identify a particular branch For example 001 - SCB chennai'^ARMCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'it a unnique 3-character code that will identify the particular Account Relationship Manager This field will accept both alphabets and numbers For example SK0'^SHORTNAME VARCHAR(110) COMMENT 'Displays the Short Name that was captured while opening Relationship for the customer The value is displayed by the system'^SEGMENTCODE VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Indicates the segment category to which the customer belongs'^OPERATINGINS VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the Account Operating instructions If Account Type is Internal, Group Master or Country master then this field is disabled The dropdown menu values available are None Individual Joint Signatories Anyone To Sign and Refer to Signature Verification signatures Anyone to sign Refer to signature verfication'^INSTCLASSCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'This can be selected from the LOV For example Government Organization, International Company, Staff etc'^REVIEWDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the date when the account is reviewed for limits'^INTERGROUPCODE VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Refers to the SCB group code that is defined for each Country/territory Refers to if the account is of associated company, wholly owned or less than wholly owned etc'^TBFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'To identify whether telephone banking facility is applicable for the customer or not'^GENERATETINFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether TINS (Telephone Identification Number) has to be generated If Account Type is Internal, then this field is disabled During the EOD the tin no: will be generated'^ISICCODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Refers to the International Standard IndustrialClassification Codes (ISIC) These are BusinessClassification codes E g 101000 refers to coal mining'^RESIDENCYCLSCODE VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Refers to the code corresponding to the country where the customer is residing'^TBTRANSFERFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether transfer of funds is allowed through phone banking between the Subsidiary Accounts and the Master Account If Account Type is Internal, then this field is disabled'^PRINTADVICEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Repricing flag'^CLUSTERUPLIFTMENT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Refers to the clustering or grouping of customers deposits etc Indicates whether the Upliftment is short or long This again is a country specific requirement'^COSTCENTREFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the Master Account is a Cost center or not This field is used for internal accounts only (e g P&L)'^CREDITREFLEVEL VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the customer is a group or not The available options are Individual, Group and Country If Group or Country is selected then Customer Group Code becomes mandatory'^EXPATOWNEDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether it is an expatriate owned company or not'^CUSTSEGMTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Customer segment code categorizes the customer like Local Corporate, International Corporate, and Multi National Corporate etc'^EALERTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'A pointer used by the MIS to monitor an account Alerts can be set to monitor the performance of the account'^IRREGULARCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the code used to denote any irregularity from the customer E g 150 refers to downgrades'^CRGCODE CHAR(3) COMMENT 'Indicates the Credit Risk Grade of the customer There are various grades such as 11,12,13,14 When the master is down graded for ex: 13/14 based on the setup at the CRG code whether the limit attach to this account has to be suspended or dropped When downgrading the master it will provide a pop up message displaying all the accounts and deals attached to this master will be downgraded And if the template is provided at the CRG code level the IIS account and provision account will be created If not the user has to manually create the IIS account/provision account and attach to the accounts or deals'^SUBSTDCODE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Substandard code linked to a Credit Risk Grade defines the level of Risk For e g Credit Risk Grade code like P8, P9 etc , can be linked to Substandard codes like 0,1,2,3,4 etc ,9 then it indicates a high risk'^BREACHCODE VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'Breach of Group Policy like Maximum Loan Tenors, etc'^CUSTTYPECODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Customer Type can be Importer, Broker dealers, Insurance co etc ,'^EXTENDEDREVIEWDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to an extended review date where a grace period (depends on country requirements) is added to the review date for the account related limits This date is greater than review date and system date The limits get suspended after this date'^LIMITEXPIRYDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to date on which limit is expired'^DROPLIMIT DECIMAL(1,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the amount to which limit defined on the account is dropped By default, Limit will be dropped to 1 after crossing the limit expiry date The drop limit values are'^DEALTENOR DECIMAL(4,0) COMMENT 'This field is used to store the deal tenor'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^RESIDENTSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Used for identifying whether the customer is a resident customer or not Possible values: R - Resident N- Non-resident'^APPROVERCOIN VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'COIN stands for Credit Officer Identification Number It is to identify the Credit officer who approves the limit application of an account'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^COIN1 VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'When the approval of more than one officer is required, then the COIN of those officers are entered in the respective fields'^COIN2 VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'When the approval of more than one officer is required, then the COIN of those officers are entered in the respective fields'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^ACCTTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates the account type of the customer Displayed values are internal, customer, group and country'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^MASTEROPENDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the date on which the account master is opened'^VALUEOFSECURITY DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'At the time of granting a facility to the customer, as security the customer mortgages tangible assets to the bank The value of tangible assets is the Value of Security'^COIN3 VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'When the approval of more than one officer is required, then the COIN of those officers are entered in the respective fields'^LLIEXPIRYDATE DATE COMMENT 'L L I Expiry date refers to the Limit Load Instruction expiry date This date should be less than or equal to extended review date Expiry date is calculated based on Limit grace period On the expiry of this date the limits are dropped to 1 This could be on account of improper document presentation'^ASSOCIATEDSTATUS DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'Associated Status'^FORCESALEVALUE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the minimum value of the mortgaged asset at any given point of time This would be useful, in case, the mortgaged assets are to be sold'^CLOSINGDATE DATE COMMENT 'Closing date of the account master in case the account master is closed'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^PARENTCOMPCNTRY VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'It a unique 2 character code which will identifies a particular country This field accepts only alphabets For example pk for pakistan'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^INTSUSPENSEACNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'The interest suspense account number of the customer'^INTSUSPDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which the interest for the account master has moved into suspense'^CRGEFFECTIVEDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date from which the credit risk grade is effective Shall be the master open date or the date on which the credit risk grade is changed from a previous value to a new value'^AFFILIATEDCODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'A unique code that refers to a particular Affiliated Code'^GROUPCODE VARCHAR(8) COMMENT 'This tab is used to attach user groups to the category codes defined For example a teller user group would be attached to a Front Office category code'^SCIREFERENCENO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Single Customer Interface Reference No will be populated in this field when SC Interface is connected'^INCOMEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the Master Account is an income master or not This is used to validate for all Income postings to accept only Customer masters and not internal accounts'^SECRETNO VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'Refers to a unique number maintained by the Bank for every Master Number Used only for Qatar'^BUSCLSCD VARCHAR(8) COMMENT 'Refers to the Central bank classification code for the customer This is a country specific requirement'^IMOCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'imo code'^GROUPNUMBER VARCHAR(8) COMMENT 'Master Charge Date'^MASTERCHRGDATE DATE COMMENT 'Master Charge Date'^REPRICINGFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates if Repricing is allowed or not and if allowed, whether it is Automatic or Manual. Select the appropriate repricing option Options are:Auto On the repricing date, system will take the Global rate for that date and this rate will be valid till the next repricing date, irrespective of changes in the Global rate in the interim Manual Rate has to be manually input on the repricing date and this rate will be valid till the next repricing date, irrespective of changes in the Global rate in the interim None No repricing is allowed for this account Note: Choice of Auto or Manual option is possible only for those accounts whose Products have Repricing Flag set to Yes at Product Code Setup level'^GROUPNO VARCHAR(8) COMMENT 'GROUP NUMBER'^REFMASTERNO VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'GROUP NUMBER'^CLOSEALLOWED VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Close allowed'^MASTREOPENDT DATE COMMENT 'master reopen date'^CHANNELID VARCHAR(12) COMMENT ''^TAXREGNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'tax registration number'^CENTRALBANKCRG VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Central Bank Charge'^ORGARMCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'originator arm code'^BORROWINGTYPEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'borrowing type flag'^MANUALCRGGRADECHANGE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Master Charge Date'^CUSSEGEFFDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date on which the customer segment code has been changed'^VATREGFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'vat registration flag'^CRGCODECHNGDT DATE COMMENT 'charge code change date'^PREVCRGCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Indicates the flag whether to print the advice or not Possible values: Y, N'^ORGCRGCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'originator charge code'^INSTITUTIONALCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'institutional code'^TAXREGFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'tax registration flag'^VATREGNO VARCHAR(12) COMMENT 'vat registration number'^SEGEFFDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date on which the segment code has been changed'^LASTCONTACTDT DATE COMMENT 'Column to capture the Account Master Level Last Contacted Date by the customer'^VATCOMMENTSUPDATEBY VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'vat comments update by'^VATCOMMENTS VARCHAR(100) COMMENT 'vat comments'^VATCOMMENTSDATE DATE COMMENT 'vat comments date'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_mdeltyp.col_schema
property.value: MMKDEALTYPE VARCHAR(4) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Money Market Deal type code used for defining the codes for deposits and loans (DEALS)'^DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'Description of the Money Market Deal type code defined'^ACCLASSCODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'A unique code that refers to particular Account classification/type These code classifies the account for Balance Sheet purposes This is one of the chart fields in PSGL'^PRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the product code of the account / deal (product like Savings account, Current Account,Fixed Deposits,Loans and Interest products)'^DEPOSITORLOAN VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Used for determining whether the Money Market Deal Type code that is defined is for Deposit or Loan Possible Values :- D for Deposits and L for Loans'^INTERESTCODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Refers to the Interest code which will be attached to an account / Deal for the purpose of calculating and apply interest'^DLYINTACRL VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate daily interest accrual'^TRSACRINTUPFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate daily interest accrual'^DEALGENTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the deal is a customer deal or Funding deal'^OFFSETMARGINPER DECIMAL(15,9) COMMENT 'Margin in percentage default is 0%'^ONLNCONFADVFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate if online confirmation advise has to be generated during deal booking'^ROLLOVERWAITPR DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'Rollover Wait period until it will wait for a manual rollover deal in days'^DEPOSITTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'To identify the deposit type such as None, Flexi, Clustered etc'^CUSTCONTRACODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Contra code may be defined as the mechanism that helps in identifying the internal account that needs to be impacted in cases where P&L is involved For example 100011 for cash in hand'^BRNCONTRACODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Contra code may be defined as the mechanism that helps in identifying the internal account that needs to be impacted in cases where P&L is involved For example 100011 for cash in hand'^DRTRNCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'transaction code which is used to post debit entries'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_prd.col_schema
property.value: PRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Refers to the product code of the account / deal (product like Savings account, Current Account,Fixed Deposits,Loans and Interest products)'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^STMTTYPECODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Refers to a valid statement type code that describes the type of statement Statement Type codes should be setup as part of common codes'^DEFSTMTFREQ VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'If the product is eligible for statement generation,the default frequency of statement generation for the particular product can be input here This is the default value for the product unless it is changed otherwise Should be a valid frequency code that'^DEFSORTCODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Refers to the default Sort Code for statements Sort code is used to group statements for printing and dispatching Should be a valid sort code that has been setup under Common codes All the above are default values for the product statement, unless otherw'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'Description of product code Can be Alphanumeric, within a length of 50 characters'^CHRGSTMTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag indicates whether charge statements are required to be generated for the product that is defined This field is currently not used'^DEALCONFFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'It indicate if a deal confirm can be produced for a particular product You can choose Yes if a charge confirm can be produced'^ACSTATEMENTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag indicates whether account statements are required to be generated for the product that is defined For example for Japan, this flag has been set to Yes, for Current and Savings accounts products'^INTSTATEMENTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag indicates whether interest statements are required to be generated for the product that is defined This field is currently not used'^RECEIPTPRINTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag is used to indicate if receipt printing is allowed for this product For ex In UAE, the flag is set to Yes for products like Current account, Call deposit,savings account and Installment loan It has been set to No for Fixed deposit, fixed loan'^ODFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'If this flag is set to yes, overdraft will be allowed on the account which is based on the product defined, when a transaction hits the account and sufficient funds are not available If this flag is set to No, then the Transaction processing system would'^LIENFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate if lien can be allowed for Accounts based on this product This is mainly used under retail limits If this flag is set to No, then the limit/ Lien radio button on the Multiple limit lien screen will not be enabled This means that liens ca'^ODTOCSAFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether a transaction entry,(for the defined product code) which causes an A/c to overdraw, can be posted to CSA (Computer Suspense account) If allow overdraft is No, then this will be set to yes'^DROPLIMITSFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate whether limits can be dropped for EMS Accounts with this product No validation happens on the basis of this flag This field is currently not in use'^EXPDTCHANGEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'If this flag is set to Yes, change of limit expiry date is allowed for this product This field is currently not used'^PALPRODIND VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'P & L Product indicator'^EXCESSREPORTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Excess to be reported for the product'^ASSETLIABILITY VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Asset or liability'^DRLISTINGFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate if this product can be included in debit turnover This flag is currently not in use'^DRTURNOVERFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Debit turn over flag'^PRODUCTGROUPING VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'This field is used for grouping of products for MIS/ printing purposes The values can be from 0 to 9 This field is currently not used and can be set to 0 for all products'^PAYCONTRAAC VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the Account No Where the contra entries for the specified Branch are posted'^MONTHSTODORMANT DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'This field is used to enter the number of months after which the account dealing with the product becomes Dormant If transactions do not take place on the account for the defined period of time, the status of the account is changed For example, In UAE, th'^CRTURNOVERFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate if this product can be included in credit turnover This flag is currently not in use'^MONTHSTOUNCLAIMED DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'This field indicates the number of months after which an account becomes Unclaimed If transactions do not take place on the account for the defined period of time, the status of the account is changed The months to unclaimed should be the period after t'^MASTERCODEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'If this flag is set to yes, then the Master Account No becomes mandatory during transaction postings We use this feature for finding cost centres, by using dummy masters for cost centres This will be Yes for P&L product and No for the rest In the transa'^PRODUCTCODEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag can be set to Yes, if input of product code is to be mandatory, while transaction posting This will be Yes for P&L product and No for the rest In the transaction posting screen, product code is generated for MIS purpose to know the product prof'^PRDCLASS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This field is used to select the category of the product The different product classes are: A - Accounts ~ products with this class are used to open Subsidiary Accounts for e g Current Accounts, savings Account,D - Deals ~ products with this class are u'^CONTINGENTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag is used to indicate if this is a contingent product This is mainly used for non fund based products like LC/ Guarantees For e g this flag is set to Yes for products like Performance Bid Bonds, Undrawn Commitment, Export Bills for collection, c'^INTINSUSPENSEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag indicates if the account is an Interest in Suspense account It is always set to no, except for Interest in Suspense products When a customer is downgraded ( risk grade), then this flag is used to indicate if the interest on customer s account c'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^PROVISIONFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag indicated if the product is a bad and doubtful provision product If the Product is for Provision then it will be Yes otherwise it will be No'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^ISCHQREQALLOWED VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the particular Product under set up is entitled for any cheque book request/ issue If this flag is set to Yes, then only the CheReq Currencies tab gets enabled In this tab,the different currencies for Cheque book issue can be assigned'^CNTRYDRIMPACTFLG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Some products like loan when they are released, incrementally will impact the group exposure or country s exposure To update such status the products at setup stage will be defined whether it will have debit impact or credit impact at country or group l'^CNTRYCRIMPACTFLG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'If yes is selected this will update the country s credit exposure whenever transaction occurs in this product code For e g, This flag is set to Yes, for commercial Loans,Demand deposit accounts,Guarantees etc (US Codes)'^GRPCUSCRIMPACTFLG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'If yes is selected this will update the Group/ Customer s credit exposure whenever transaction occurs in this product code For e g, This flag is set to No, while Country credit is set to Yes, for committed facility, contra guarantees,Commercial Paper ( U'^GRPCUSDRIMPACTFLG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate updation of group limit'^LIMITUSAGE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates that if this product uses the limits, then whether this is by way of deals or under limits module'^PASSBOOKREQFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'If this flag is set to yes, then customer accounts using this product, are allowed to request for passbooks If this flag is set to No, then in the passbook printing screen,the popup message passbook printing not allowed for this product is displayed iPRD PASSBOOKREQFLAG'^REPRICEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the Product is entitled for any interest re-pricing feature or not If repricing flag is set to No, at this level, then in the Accounts- Interest screen,the repricing flag is disabled If repricing flag is set to Yes at the product level'^SPLPRDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This field is used to indicate if the product is an Islamic product The dropdown values are None and Islamic Product The default value is None This field is mainly used in UAE Example of Islamic Products are Islamic Current Account, Islamic repayment ac'^FUNDEDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Funded Flag'^SPLPROGRAMNAME VARCHAR(200) COMMENT 'Special Program Name'^USERDEFINEDLMT VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'user defined limit'^PRDCATEGORY VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'product category'^STOPINTACC VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'stop interest account'^STOPINTAPP VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'stop interest application'^SUPPSTMTFLG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'support statement flag'^RESTRICTACCOPEN VARCHAR(1) COMMENT ''^DEFSORTCODEINTL VARCHAR(4) COMMENT ''^CONSOLSTMTDESC VARCHAR(100) COMMENT 'Consolidated statement description'^CRINTPRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the Credit Interest Product code'^DRINTPRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the Debit Interest Product code'^SECUREDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate whether the Limit facility is secured or not Valid Values Y/N'^GLDEPARTMENTCODEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Funded Flag'^REPATRIABLEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT '#N/A'^MAKEFREQUENCY VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'make frequency'^TWOINONEFACILITY VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'two in one facility'^MINDEPOSITSIZE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'mind deposit size'^MAKEMULTIPLES DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'make multiples'^BREAKMULTIPLES DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'break multiples'^NONTXNFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'non transaction flag'^AUTOREORDERCHQBK VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'auto record cheque book'^TAXCATEGORYAPPLICABLE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'tax category applicable'^SHORTDESC VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'short description'^ALLOWMOA VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'allow monthly allowance'^MINMONTHSTOCLOSE DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'min months to close'^AUTOCLOSE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'auto close'^PRDTYPDGT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'product type'^EARLYCLOSUREPERIOD DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'early closure period'^CLOSURECHARGE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Closure Charge'^SUPPRESSSWFSTMT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT ''

Tele banking, enquiry, etc The value of the field is automatically populated from the First name, Middle Name and Last Name fields However, it can be modified But it is not used anywhere'^DATEOFBIRTH DATE COMMENT 'Indicates the date of birth of the customer Date format will be country specific'^NATIONALITYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the nationality of the customer'^INCORPORATEDDATE DATE COMMENT 'Indicates the date on which the company is incorporated The Date of Incorporation should not be greater than current date'^DOMICILECOUNTRY VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'A unique country code that indicates the customers country of Domicile'^RESIDENTCOUNTRY VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'A unique country code that indicates the customers country of residence'^RESIDENTSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates the resident status of the customer Based on Domicile Country and Country of Residence, system automatically displays the Resident Status'^RESIDENTSINCE VARCHAR(7) COMMENT 'Refers to the month and year since when the customer is residing in the country This field is disabled if the customer is a Non Resident'^UNIQUEID1 VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the details Unique ID'^UNIQUEID1EXPDT DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the expiry date of Unique ID'^UNIQUEID2 VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the details Unique ID'^UNIQUEID2EXPDT DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the expiry date of Unique ID'^UNIQUEID3 VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the details Unique ID'^UNIQUEID3EXPDT DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the expiry date of Unique ID'^UNIQUEID4 VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the details Unique ID'^UNIQUEID4EXPDT DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the expiry date of Unique ID'^UNIQUEID5 VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the details Unique ID'^UNIQUEID5EXPDT DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the expiry date of Unique ID'^MARITALST VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Refers to the Marital Status of the customer The available values are'^DOMICILENOOFDEP DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'Indicates the number of persons dependent upon the customer in Domicile Country'^TOTALNOOFDEP DECIMAL(3,0) COMMENT 'Indicates the total number of dependent for the relationship'^MOTHERSMAIDENNAME VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Refers to the maiden name of the customers mother'^IDCHECK1 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Identification Check1'^IDCHECK2 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Identification Check2'^REFERREDBYREL VARCHAR(9) COMMENT 'Indicates the Relationship No of the person who referred / introduced the new Customer'^REFERREDBYNAME VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Indicates the name of the person who referred / introduced the new relationship Value (name of the introducer) will be populated in this field by the system if Relationship No is entered in the previous field Otherwise, the value may be manually input'^PREFERREDLANGATM VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the code corresponding to the language in which the customer wants the ATM display'^PREFERREDLANGTB VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the code corresponding to the language in which the customer prefers the Telephone banking service'^PREFERREDLANGSPEAK VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the code corresponding to the language in which the customer prefers to communicate'^CONSTITUTIONCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'A code that indicates the Constitution to which the company belongs'^WORKTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'It is used to record the nature or type of work the customer is involved The available values are:'^PROFESSIONCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the code corresponding to the customers profession'^SRVINDICATORCODE VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Indicates the service level to be accorded to the customer depending on the credit worthiness of the customer Available values in the LOV are:'^QUALIFICATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the educational qualification of the customer'^FORMRCPTDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the date on which the bank received the application System date is the default date Such date should not be greater than the system date'^FRIENDNAME VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Refers to the name of the Customers friend/ relative/colleague'^FRIENDOFFPHONENO VARCHAR(25) COMMENT 'Refers to the office telephone number of the friend or colleague'^WELCOMEPRINTEDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Welcome Letter Printed Date'^FRIENDEXTNO VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Refers to the telephone extension number of the friend or colleague/relative'^FRIENDFAXNO VARCHAR(25) COMMENT 'Refers to the fax number of the friend or colleague'^FRIENDRESPHONENO VARCHAR(25) COMMENT 'Refers to the residence telephone number of the friend or colleague or relative'^FRIENDMOBILENO VARCHAR(25) COMMENT 'Refers to the Mobile/Pager number of the friend or colleague or relative'^RELSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Relationship Status'^STATUSUPDATEDT DATE COMMENT 'Refers to status update date of the relationship'^ACTIVATEDDT DATE COMMENT 'Refers to relationship activated date'^EMPLOYERCODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Refers to the code corresponding to the employer of the customer'^DESIGNATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the code corresponding to the designation of the customer Example - CLK for Clerk'^POSITIONTITLE VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Refers to the position of the customer in the organization'^STAFFNO VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'Refers to the Staff number or Identification number of the customer in the organisation'^DEPARTMENT VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Refers to the department in which the customer works in the organisation Example Accounts'^DATEOFJOINING DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the date on which the customer had joined the organisation'^SALARYDAY DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the customers Salary Day of every month'^ORGANISATIONNAME VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Refers to the name of the customers organisation'^MTHLYBASIC DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Basic Salary of the customer for a month'^NATUREOFBUSINESS VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Refers to the type or nature of business of the customers organization'^GROSSMTHLYINCOME DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Gross Monthly income received by the customer If the type of work of the customer is Self-employed or Both (self employed and salaried), then this value is calculated by the system based on data input'^MTHLYCOMM DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the amount deducted from the customers salary as expenses'^OTHERMTHLYINCOME DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Income (others) received by the customer in addition to monthly salary received from the employer Refers to the average turn over in case of Self-employed'^MTHLYALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Income (others) received by the customer in addition to monthly salary received from the employer Refers to the average turn over in case of Self-employed'^OTHERCOMPBENEFITS VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Refers to other Company Benefits received by the user'^OTHERINCOMECODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Indicates the source of other income e g Share Market, Monthly interests earned through Investments, deposits etc , This field is mandatory if value is input in the Other Income field'^SPOUSEMTHLYINCOME DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to Spouses Monthly Income'^MTHLYDEDUCTIONS DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the amount deducted from the customers salary as expenses'^OTHERINCOMEFREQ VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates how frequently the customer receives income (others) This does not include the monthly salary This field is mandatory if value is input in the Other Income field'^ACCRUEDEOSB DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the customer s accrued End Of Service Benefits The value of the field is displayed by the system'^REMARKS VARCHAR(250) COMMENT 'Fill up with any additional notes/remarks such as the purpose of the visit of the customer'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^RISKREASON VARCHAR(150) COMMENT 'Refers to the reasons for the risk level of the relationship This is a KYC requirement'^REVIEWDATE DATE COMMENT 'Based on the Risk Code, system automatically generates the next review date This is a KYC requirement'^EMPSPECVAL DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Employer Special Validation'^HOUSINGPROV VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Denotes whether the company provides Housing accommodation'^SALARYMODE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'The available values are'^SCBACHOLDER VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the customer is a SCB account holder'^SCBACNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the SCB Account No'^CONVALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Conveyance allowance'^COLIALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Cost of Living allowance, if any'^SHIFTALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the shift allowance, if any'^MEALALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the food/meal allowance, if any'^CARALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the car allowance, if any'^SOCALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Social allowance received by the customer'^CHILDALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to Children allowance, if any'^MEDICALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Medical Allowance received by the customer'^UTILALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the utility allowance (like water charges, electricity) received by the customer'^DEARALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Dearness allowance received by the customer'^FURNALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the furnishing allowance received by the customer'^BACHALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Bachelor Allowance received by the customer'^OTHERALLOWANCE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to Other Allowances'^FIXEDOVERTIME DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the overtime work done by the customer regularly at a fixed time'^VAROVERTIME DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the overtime work done by the customer at different time'^VARINCENTIVE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the Variable incentive the customer gets'^STAFF VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the customer is a staff or not'^BIRTHPLACE VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Indicates the place of birth of the customer'^RISKCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Code to maintain various types of risks Risk codes are linked at the relationship level as well as at the master level ML1, ML2 and ML3 are relationship level risk codes This also holds transaction based risk codes'^BANKRUPTCYDATE DATE COMMENT 'Refers to the date on which the customer became bankrupt This field gets enabled and becomes mandatory if Bankruptcy Record Flag is Yes'^BANKRUPTCYRECORDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the customer has bankruptcy record'^BLACKLISTREASON VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the reason why the customer is blacklisted Appropriate reason may be selected from the LOV'^CREDITBUREAUINFO VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'Refers to any Credit Bureau related information This field is country specific'^HOUSECONTRACTTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Refers to the Type of Office accommodation of the customer, like Rented, owned, etc'^NEGATIVERECORDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the customer has a negative record from Credit Bureau'^NUMBEROFCARS DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'Indicates the number of cars the customer has'^SCBSECEXPOSURE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the secured exposure of SCB on account of the primary applicant'^SCBUNSECEXPOSURE DECIMAL(25,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the unsecured exposure of SCB on account of the primary applicant'^TOTALMONTHSEXP DECIMAL(4,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the amount deducted from the customers salary as expenses'^CONSOLSTMT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Can be Yes or No Yes indicates that consolidated statement can be generated and issued to the customer'^LASTCONSTMTDATE DATE COMMENT 'Last Consolidated Statement Date'^ACCTDEALCONSOLFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Account Deal Consolidate Flag'^CONSOLSTMTLANG VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Consolidated Statement Language'^RELSINCE DATE COMMENT 'Un secured Limit'^SYSTEMRISK VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'system risk'^MLRISKLSTDT DATE COMMENT 'ml risk last date'^MLRISKLSTID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ml risk last id'^SYSRISKLSTDT DATE COMMENT 'system risk last date'^SYSRISKRSN VARCHAR(100) COMMENT 'system risk reason'^CDDREVIEWDT DATE COMMENT 'cdd review date'^CDDREVIEWID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'cdd review id'^ORGSYSRSKDT DATE COMMENT 'originator system risk date'^TAXCTGCODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Refers to the Tax category code basing on which the calculated tax is to be debited to the Nominated Tax Account of the customer'^LASTRSKCODECHANGEDT DATE COMMENT 'Last Risk Code Changed Date'^LASTKYCREVSTATUSCHANGEDT DATE COMMENT 'Last KYC Review Status Changed Date'^SDDELIGIBLESTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'SDD ELIGIBLE STATUS'^SDDELIGIBLEDATE DATE COMMENT 'SDD ELIGIBLE DATE'^RISKRATINGDATE DATE COMMENT 'risk rating date'^KYCSTATUSCODE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT ''^LASTREVIEWEDBY VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'Last reviewed by?'^RELIDINPUTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'rel id input flag'^ANNUALINCOME DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'Annual Income'^ANNUALINCOMELSTUPDT DATE COMMENT 'annual income last update'^PREVRSKLEVELS INT COMMENT 'previous risk levels'^RIWACTYPECD VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'riwac type code'^CHANNELID VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'Channel ID'^SYSGENCUSTID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'system generated customer id'^ORIGMAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'originator maker id'^SENIORCITIZENFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'senior citizen flag'^CORPCUST VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'corporate customer'^GSTRESIDENCYSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'gst residency status'^SYSTEMRSKLEVEL VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'system risk level'^KYCREVIEWSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'kyc review status'^RELOPENDATE DATE COMMENT 'rel open date'^ARMCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Arm Code'^SEGMENTCODE VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Indicates the segment to which the customer/account holder belongs It is defaulted with the segment code value in the Master account'^CUSTSEGMTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'customer segment code'^TAXRESIDENCYSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'tax residency status'^LASTREVIEWEDDT DATE COMMENT 'last reviewed date'^LASTSYSRSKLVLCHANGEDT DATE COMMENT 'last system risk level change date'^CNTRYKYCSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Country know your customer status'^CNTRYRSKCODECHANGEDT DATE COMMENT 'country risk code change date'^CNTRYLASTREVIEWDT DATE COMMENT 'country last review date'^CNTRYRISKREASON VARCHAR(150) COMMENT 'country risk reason'^CNTRYNEXTREVIEWDT DATE COMMENT 'country next review date'^CNTRYKYCREVSTATUSCHANGEDT DATE COMMENT 'country know your customer status change date'^HOUSEHOLDID VARCHAR(8) COMMENT 'House hold ID'^STATEOFORGCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT ''^GOVTAREACODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT ''^LASTCONTCHNGDATE DATE COMMENT ''^LASTADDCHNGDATE DATE COMMENT ''

COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account / deal'^TERM VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL COMMENT 'The user can select the dropdown optios as Days/Month/Years for each band of rate inserted'^PERIOD property.value: RISKCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Code to maintain various types of risks Risk codes are linked at the relationship level as well as at the master level ML1, ML2 and ML3 are Risk Code'^RISKTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the defined Risk code can be associated to a Relationship (customer) or Master Account or Subsidiary Account or Deal or Batch'^EXECONOPNFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Executes the Risk While Opening the specified Risk type'^EXECONCLSFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Executes the Risk While Closing the specified Risk type'^EXECONTRANFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Executes the Risk While any transaction happens in the specified Risk type'^EXECONENQFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Executes the Risk While any enquiry happens in the specified Risk type'^CHECKMETHOD VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This option defines the Check Methods based on which the specific Risk should be executed The users can select the required value from the dropdown menu The values available are:'^SYSALLOWEDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate whether system based risk check to be executed This flag is available for Program Based Check Method only'^EXECQUERY VARCHAR(3000) COMMENT 'Not used in the system'^EXECPROGRAM VARCHAR(40) COMMENT 'Is mandatory if the checkmethod is either account based or program based'^RISKLEVEL VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate that can be executed by the system for this risk :: 0 - None, 1 - Notify Users, 2 - Notify Groups, 3 - Notify Users, Groups, 4 - Provide Warning, 5 - Notify Users & send for approval, 6 - Notify Groups & send for approval, 7 - Notify Users, Groups and Send for Approval, 8 -Send for Approval, 9 -Reject Transaction However, the valid ones that work now are the Actions 4, 8,9'^EXECONDRTRNFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Executes the Risk While any debit transaction happens in the specified Risk type'^NOTIFYUSER1 VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'Userid to which the risk need to be notified'^NOTIFYUSER2 Used for SWIFT and TELEX statements'^STMTSTARTNO DECIMAL(7,0) COMMENT 'Statement Number'^STMTENDNO DECIMAL(7,0) COMMENT 'Total Pages of the account'^STMTTYPECODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Refers to a unique code that defines a particular statement type'^PROGRAMID VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'It uniquely identifies the program which has to be executed for this job to begun'^HEADER1 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Statement Header1 Message'^EXTRACTEDFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Extracted Flag - Y/N'^HEADER2 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Statement Header2 Message'^ENQUIRYTELNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the telephone number that is available for enquiry on the branch'^FOOTER1 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Statement Footer1 Message'^FOOTER2 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Statement Footer2 Message'^MESSAGE1 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Statement Special Message1'^MESSAGE2 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Statement Special Message2'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^SUPRESSSTMTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Suppress Statement Flag - codes'^DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'It refers to the description of the statement ttype code It is a mandatory field'^PROGRAMID VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'It uniquely identifies the program which has to be executed for this job to begun'^NOOFLINES DECIMAL(4,0) COMMENT 'Refers to the number of lines If format group is advices or deal advices, then it becomes optional'^HEADER1 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Refers to any header to be displayed'^HEADER2 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Refers to any header to be displayed'^FOOTER1 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Refers to any header to be displayed'^FOOTER2 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT 'Refers to any header to be displayed'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^MESSAGE1 VARCHAR(75) COMMENT COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^DEFAULTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Specifies if this statement should be generated by default'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^FORMATGRP VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Refers to the Format Group The available values are Account Statement,Interest Statement,Advices,Deal Statement,Charge Statement Deal Advice'^IS_CONSOLIDATED VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'If this box is checked, then Consolidated Advices are sent This field gets enabled only if Format Group is Advices or Deal Advices'^ORIENTATION VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates how the content is to be number'^DESCLAIM VARCHAR(1500) COMMENT 'The disclaimer that should be printed in the statement (footer)'^CHARGECODE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'It a four character code which identifies a particular charge code For example CHG1'^INCLUDEEXTENDEDNARRATIVE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'It a four character code which identifies a particular charge code For example CHG1'^MVONACT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT ''

sequence number'^AMOUNT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'It is the amount that can be transferred between the origin and the destination accounts If the Multiple flag is set to Yes, then multiples of the amount credit flag oif set Y the block creates immediately on the destination account when credit transaction is posted'^FORCEPOSTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'force post flag to set Y for freeing from risk account to executing the Trnasction'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS or available balance'^LASTEXECDATE DATE COMMENT 'last execution date'^DESTCURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account'^DESTACCOUNTNO VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'Refers to the property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_trncd.col_schema
property.value: TRNCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'transaction code refers the cr / dr entry posted for a trn The transaction codes are mapped to the transction type, certain transaction codes are used by the system to post tax, interest,charges and batches'^DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'Transaction code description- alphanumeric- 50 characters'^NARRATIVE1 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATIVE2 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATIVE3 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATIVE4 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^NARRATIVE5 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^NARRATIVE6 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MANUALNARRFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether narration for the particular transaction can be manually input If No is selected, then the Transaction narration,at the time of transaction posting, will be defaulted with narration input in the Narrative tab screen If manual narration'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^ADVICEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Advice for the transaction will be generated only if this flag is set to Y'^CHEQUENOFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether input of cheque number is mandatory for those transactions posted with the particular Transaction code According to this setup, the Cheque number field would become mandatory in the transaction posting screen ( teller/ Backoffice)'^VALUEDATEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'It indicates if the value days is amendable for those transaction which are posted with a particular transaction code Select yes if the transaction code is amenbable'^VALUEDAYS DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'it refers to the number of days for a fund to be realesed If the value days input is 2 then the fund are avaliable to the customers after two working days'^TRNTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Code to maintain types of transactions'^ONLINETRIGGERFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the Instructions (standing orders) should be executed prior to its actual execution date When an online standing Instruction is setup on an account, it gets triggered when a transaction posted to the Primary Account (through Teller or'^FINANCIALTRN VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate if the transaction code can be used to post financial transaction For codes setup for non financial transactions, for e g Non financial transaction code, SWIFT statement,e mail stmt, fax stmt etc , this flag is set to No Only financial'^CRTURNOVERFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate if this product can be included in credit turnover This flag is currently not in use'^INTBEARINGTRNFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag is used to identify whether the transaction is an interest bearing one ie , whether calculation of interest is allowed for these transactions Interest bearing transactions are considered for calculation of interest balance eBBS maintains an #'^DRTURNOVERFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'It indicates if the transaction with a particular transaction code should be included in the debit transaction Select yes if it should be included'^INCREMENTCTR VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag is currently not in use and is defaulted to Yes'^LASTTRNDTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Flag to indicate whether Last Transaction date should be updated by the system in the table whenever the particular transaction code is used for posting the transactions For most transaction codes it is set to Yes Examples of transactions where this fla'^ACCTSTSCHGALLOWED VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether status change of accounts is allowed for those transactions posted with the transaction code under reference This is normally used when Dormant accounts are to be changed to Normal status For e g If a normal cash deposit/ withdrawal tr'^PRINTONSTMT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'While printing the statement, for these transactions whether transaction codes are also required to be printed or not is defined here These statements will be generated during the End of Day If Financial Transaction is set to Yes, then this field gets en'^UPDEMARKBAL VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag is currently not in use'^LASTTRNDTEXSYSFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether Last Transaction date should be updated whenever the particular transaction code is used for posting the transactions other than system generated transactions/ entries For some system generated transactions like Credit/Debit Interest, r'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^UPDINTDUE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether Interest due can be updated automatically If Financial Transaction is set to Yes, then this field gets enabled and becomes mandatory This is normally set to No for all transactions Only for Transactions involving Limits and O/D, it i'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^GENERATIONMODE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This tab gets enabled only when system generation is selected in Advice category Here the option of advice generation on online or offline mode is defined If advice flag is set to Yes, then the generation mode for advice can be given'^STMTTYPECODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Refers to a valid statement type code that describes the type of statement Statement Type codes should be setup as part of common codes'^VALPRINT VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'This flag is used to indicate if validation printing is required for the particular transaction This is always defaulted to No For teller transaction only, choice of Yes or No is to be exercised to print the receipt/ counterfoil to the customer for the'^INTVALUEDAYS DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This field is used to enter value days for calculation of interest This value date for interest calculation is different from the available balance value date This field is specific to Jordan'^MIRRORTRN VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'For all transactions, that have to be mirrored, this flag has to be set as Yes This field is specific to China'^INTERESTVALUEBASEDON VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'It indicates if calculation of the transaction posted with the particular transaction code'^AUTOSELFRECONFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT ''^SELFRECONORGFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT ''^REVMNEMONIC VARCHAR(25) COMMENT 'used for storing the reversal mnemonics'^SELFRECONFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'self reconciliation flag'^PASSBKMNE VARCHAR(25) COMMENT 'used for storing the mnemonics'^AUTOSELFRECONNOFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'auto self reconciliation flag'^AUTOISELFRECONNOFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'auto self reconciliation flag'^PURPOSE VARCHAR(250) COMMENT ''^RNARRATIVE1 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT ''^RNARRATIVE2 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT ''^RNARRATIVE3 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT ''^RNARRATIVE4 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT ''^RNARRATIVE5 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT ''^RNARRATIVE6 VARCHAR(35) COMMENT ''^RETACCTSTSCHGALLOWED VARCHAR(1) COMMENT ''

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_trnch.col_schema
property.value: TRNCHID VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL COMMENT 'TRNCHID'^DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(35) COMMENT 'description'^TRNCHEFFDT DATE COMMENT 'The date on which the tranche becomes effective and deals are created for active subscriptions'^TRNCHTYPE VARCHAR(4) COMMENT 'This field is used to capture the tenure of the tranche and is given in the extract to Statement Engine for printing in the advices'^TRNCHCURRCD VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Currency code of the tranche'^TRNCHMINAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'The minimum subscription amount for the tranche If this amount is not reached, then the business would abort the tranche'^TRNCHMAXAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'The maximum subscription amount for a tranche The total value of subscription for a tranche should not exceed this amount The system would validate this amount and would prompt a message to the authorizer indicating the same'^SUBMINAMT DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'The minimum subscription amount for the tranche If this amount is not reached, then the business would abort the tranche'^CPNPAYFREQ VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'coupon payment frequency'^SUBFMDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date on which the tranche is open for subscription'^SUBTODATE DATE COMMENT 'The end date for subscription The tranche status will change to closed on during the end of day of this date'^EARLYREDEMDT DATE COMMENT 'early redemption date'^MATURITYDT DATE COMMENT 'Maturity Date'^EARLYREDEMADVDT DATE COMMENT 'early redemption advice date'^INVSTDET VARCHAR(250) COMMENT 'Investment detail'^TRNCHSTATUS VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Tranch Status'^TOTNOSUB DECIMAL(5,0) COMMENT 'The total number of approved subscriptions would be displayed in this field'^TOTSUBVALUE DECIMAL(25,3) COMMENT 'This is a system computed field The cumulative amount of all the approved subscriptions would be displayed here'^ABORTFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Abort Flag'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^TRNCHDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date on which tranche is open for subscription'^TRANCHEDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date on which the tranche becomes effective and deals are created for active subscriptions'

property.name: edmhdpif.table.ebbsprd_za_trntype.col_schema
property.value: TRANSTYPECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Transaction type code defines the kind of transaction posted by the user like cahs deposit / cash withdrawal It is a 3 character alphanumeric field'^DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'Description of the transtypecode - CDS cash deposit local currency'^MAKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is initiated or created ( Represents Branch ID or Branch number)'^SINGLEMULTICURR VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the transaction supports single or multicurrency Foreign currency transactions are also termed as single currency in eBBS'^DRTRNCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'transaction code which is used to post debit entries'^MAKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'Date on which Maker has created the Record'^MAKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the Maker who has Created the record'^DRCURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account'^DRCONTRACODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Contra code may be defined as the mechanism that helps in identifying the internal account that needs to be impacted in cases where P&L is involved For example 100011 for cash in hand'^MAKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the maker has created the Record'^MAKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the maker created this transaction'^DRBRANCHTOPOST VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'The branch to which the debit transaction is to be posted It can be either the account (A) or the user (U) branch'^DRTXNTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the debit entry will be in single and multi currency'^CRCURRENCYCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Identifies the currency code of the account'^CRCONTRACODE VARCHAR(6) COMMENT 'Contra code may be defined as the mechanism that helps in identifying the internal account that needs to be impacted in cases where P&L is involved For example 100011 for cash in hand'^CRBRANCHTOPOST VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'The branch to which the credit transaction is to be posted It can be either the account (A) or the user (U) branch'^CRTXNTYPE VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'credit trasaction type'^PURCHASESELL VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the particular transaction type involves Purchase or Sale of foreign currency transactions'^BASETRNTYPE VARCHAR(2) COMMENT 'Indicates the base transaction type'^PRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Refers to the product code of the account / deal (product like Savings account, Current Account,Fixed Deposits,Loans and Interest products)'^EXTSYSFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether this transaction type can be used by any other external system'^EXTSYSPROGRAMID VARCHAR(60) COMMENT 'The program ID for the external system'^CHECKERBRANCH VARCHAR(5) COMMENT 'The branch where the transaction is going for authorization ( Represents Authorizer branch number)'^CHECKERDATE DATE COMMENT 'The date when the authorizer authorized the transaction'^CHECKERID VARCHAR(10) COMMENT 'ID of the checker who has Approved or Checked the record'^CHECKERIPADDRESS VARCHAR(16) COMMENT 'System IP address using which the checker has Approved or Checked the Record'^CHECKERTIME CHAR(8) COMMENT 'The time when the authrozier authorized the transaction'^STATUSFLAG DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'This specifys the status of the transaction like ( Completed , Approve Create , Verify Create , Rejected , Accepted)'^CRTRNCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'transaction code which is used to post credit entries'^NARRATIVEFLAG VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'Indicates whether the Narration is to be entered or not This is specific to Philipines'^NARRATION VARCHAR(15) COMMENT 'This field indicates additional narration (remarks) for the transactions'^RATEPRODUCTCODE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Rate product Code'^MIRRORTRNTYPE VARCHAR(3) COMMENT 'Indicates whether this transaction is to be mirrored in the main account This is specific to China'^TXNOPERATION DECIMAL(2,0) COMMENT 'transaction operation'^ISCASH VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'is cash'^DRPRDMASTGLDEPTID VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'debit product master gl department id'^CRPRDMASTGLDEPTID VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'credit product master gl department id'^VALUNIQUEID1 VARCHAR(1) COMMENT 'value unique id'^PURPOSE VARCHAR(250) COMMENT ''
